title: ARRRGGGHH
body: An intentional feeder and a raging afker in 2 games during promos. I wish people would consider other people when they play this game

replies.body: There really needs to be a tribunal in oce
Tribunals are coming, they aren't in any region at the moment.
Because you can see in stuff like LOLNexus when people are in promos, so people throw the game for "fun".

ARRRGGGHH

Why do people keep complaining about this stuff on the forums? Most people don't really care.
